div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

h5.strong: Based upon guidance from the Governor's Office, Eatontown Public Schools will remain closed and continue to follow the Home Instruction Plan through Friday, May 15th. Please know that the schools are closed until the Governor's guidance states otherwise. Thank you for your attention and cooperation. We all hope schools can be opened safely in the near future.

br.h6: Please click here for all of the latest updates regarding COVID-19 and related information. Please continue to check your email and Parent Portal for updates as well.
Eatontown Public Schools Home Instruction Plan is available online. Click here to view the district's Home Instruction Plan.

h6.a: Click here for information about Food Services during school closures.

img.alt: It's everything Eatontown, in your pocket. Cafeteria menus, events, staff directory, alerts, news

div.h3: Eatontown Public Schools , about 1 month ago
div.p: Visit the District Updates page for all of the latest information from Eatontown Public Schools regarding COVID-19: https://www.eatontown.org/o/eatontown/news?filter=83499
Messages from our Meadowbrook students during the teacher car parade today. We miss you too!

Students from the classes at Woodmere School want to say THANK YOU to all of the healthcare workers, firefighters, and police personnel who are staying on the front lines of this pandemic. Click below to see the videos they produced to show their gratitude!

THANK YOU Healthcare Workers!
